cnbc.title: Apple reports biggest revenue growth since December 2021
cnbc.summary: Apple CEO Tim Cook said Apple would "significantly grow" its AI investments, adding that the company is "open to M&A that accelerates our roadmap."

cnbc.title: Amazon's gloomy earnings forecast overshadows better-than-expected results
cnbc.summary: The guidance spooked investors who are eager to see Amazon’s hefty investments in artificial intelligence pay off.

cnbc.title: Figma more than triples in NYSE debut after selling shares at $33
cnbc.summary: Fast-growing Figma's internet software has more than 13 million users, and the customer list includes Google, Microsoft and Netflix.

cnbc.title: Amazon's cloud business records 18% growth in second quarter
cnbc.summary: Amazon announced new business from the likes of PepsiCo during the second quarter, as revenue topped $30 billion.

cnbc.title: FICO CEO defends credit score pricing amid FHFA criticism, says cost isn't blocking home ownership
cnbc.summary: In a Thursday interview with CNBC's Jim Cramer, Fair Isaac CEO Will Lansing pushed back against recent criticism of his company.

cnbc.title: Reddit shares jump as much as 20% on second-quarter sales and guidance beat
cnbc.summary: The company's revenue grew 78% year-over-year in the second quarter and was 17% above consensus estimates, the biggest beat in Reddit's history.

cnbc.title: Coinbase shares tumble as second-quarter revenue disappoints
cnbc.summary: Subscription revenue failed to offset weaker trading revenue.

cnbc.title: How wealthy yacht buyers plan to avoid the European tariffs
cnbc.summary: American boat buyers and European shipyards are scrambling to assess the damage from the proposed U.S. 15% tariffs on European-made goods.

cnbc.title: 'Gateway drug': Labubus are getting U.S. consumers hooked on Pop Mart and driving up business
cnbc.summary: Labubu toys from Pop Mart have become a hot item around the globe, and now fans are discovering its other collectibles.

cnbc.title: Trump says he asked 17 drugmakers to take steps to cut U.S. prices within 60 days
cnbc.summary: Trump posted individual letters he sent 17 drugmakers, including Eli Lilly, GSK, Pfizer, Regeneron, Merck, Pfizer and Novo Nordisk.
